thm brwitnlem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

} = {
  3bitr4i(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wne(co(c0, c3, c2), emptycls), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cima(ccnv(c3), cdif(universe, c1o))), wne(cfv(c3, cop(c0, c2)), emptycls))
  3bitr4i(wcel(cop(c0, c2), cima(ccnv(c3), cdif(universe, c1o))), wne(cfv(c3, cop(c0, c2)), emptycls), wa(wcel(cop(c0, c2), c4), wcel(cfv(c3, cop(c0, c2)), cdif(universe, c1o))), wa(wcel(cop(c0, c2), c4), wne(cfv(c3, cop(c0, c2)), emptycls)))
  anbi2i(wcel(cop(c0, c2), c4), wcel(cfv(c3, cop(c0, c2)), cdif(universe, c1o)), wne(cfv(c3, cop(c0, c2)), emptycls))
  mpbiran(wcel(cfv(c3, cop(c0, c2)), cdif(universe, c1o)), wne(cfv(c3, cop(c0, c2)), emptycls), wcel(cfv(c3, cop(c0, c2)), universe))
  fvex(c3, cop(c0, c2))
  dif1o(cfv(c3, cop(c0, c2)), universe)
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cop(c0, c2), cima(ccnv(c3), cdif(universe, c1o))), wa(wcel(cop(c0, c2), c4), wcel(cfv(c3, cop(c0, c2)), cdif(universe, c1o)))), wfn(c3, c4))
  elpreima(c3, c4, cop(c0, c2), cdif(universe, c1o))
  pm4.71ri(wne(cfv(c3, cop(c0, c2)), emptycls), wcel(cop(c0, c2), c4))
  syl6eleq(cop(c0, c2), c4, cdm(c3), wne(cfv(c3, cop(c0, c2)), emptycls))
  necon1ai(cfv(c3, cop(c0, c2)), emptycls, wcel(cop(c0, c2), cdm(c3)))
  ndmfv(cop(c0, c2), c3)
  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(c3), c4), wfn(c3, c4))

  bitri(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cima(ccnv(c3), cdif(universe, c1o))), wbr(c0, cima(ccnv(c3), cdif(universe, c1o)), c2))
  breqi(c0, c1, c2, cima(ccnv(c3), cdif(universe, c1o)))
  df-br(c0, cima(ccnv(c3), cdif(universe, c1o)), c2)
  neeq1i(co(c0, c3, c2), emptycls, cfv(c3, cop(c0, c2)))
  df-ov(c0, c3, c2)
}

thm oev(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wceq(co(c0, coe, c1), cif(cdif(c1o, c1), cfv(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, c0)), c1o), c1), wceq(c0, emptycls))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  ovmpt2(hs0, hs1, c0, con0, c1, con0, coe, cif(cdif(c1o, c1), cfv(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, c0)), c1o), c1), wceq(c0, emptycls)), cif(cdif(c1o, cv(hs1)), cfv(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, cv(hs0))), c1o), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls)), cif(cdif(c1o, cv(hs1)), cfv(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, c0)), c1o), cv(hs1)), wceq(c0, emptycls)))
  ifbieq2d(cdif(c1o, cv(hs1)), cfv(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, cv(hs0))), c1o), cv(hs1)), cfv(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, c0)), c1o), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c0, emptycls)
  fveq1d(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, cv(hs0))), c1o), cv(hs1), crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, c0)), c1o), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, cv(hs0))), c1o), crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, c0)), c1o)), wceq(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, cv(hs0))), cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, c0))))
  mpteq2dv(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, cv(hs0)), co(cv(s0), comu, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0), comu)
  rdgeq1(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, cv(hs0))), cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, c0)), c1o)
  ifeq12d(cdif(c1o, cv(hs1)), cfv(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, c0)), c1o), cv(hs1)), cdif(c1o, c1), cfv(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, c0)), c1o), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  difeq2(cv(hs1), c1, c1o)
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c1, crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, c0)), c1o))
  df-oexp(hs0, hs1, s0)
  ifex(cdif(c1o, c1), cfv(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, c0)), c1o), c1), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  difexi(c1o, c1)
  1oex()
  fvex(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, c0)), c1o), c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(con0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cif(cdif(c1o, c1), cfv(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, c0)), c1o), c1), wceq(c0, emptycls)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(con0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cif(cdif(c1o, c1), cfv(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, c0)), c1o), c1), wceq(c0, emptycls)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)

  difeq2(hs1, c1, c1o)
  fveq2(hs1, c1, rec((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[√óo]c0)), 1o))
  df-oexp(hs0, hs1, s0)

  difexi(c1o, c1)
  1oex()
  fvex(rec((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[√óo]c0)), 1o), c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(con0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(if(c0 = ‚àÖ,(1o \ c1),(rec((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[√óo]c0)), 1o)` c1)))

  diff.hs1.c(c1)

thm oevn0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wcel(emptycls, c0)), wceq(co(c0, coe, c1), cfv(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, c0)), c1o), c1)))

} = {
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wcel(emptycls, c0), wceq(co(c0, coe, c1), cfv(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, c0)), c1o), c1)))
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wcel(emptycls, c0), wceq(co(c0, coe, c1), cfv(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, c0)), c1o), c1)), wn(wceq(c0, emptycls)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wb(wcel(emptycls, c0), wn(wceq(c0, emptycls))))
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(emptycls, c0), wn(wceq(c0, emptycls)), wne(c0, emptycls))
  on0eln0(c0)
  df-ne(c0, emptycls)

  sylan9eq(co(c0, coe, c1), cfv(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, c0)), c1o), c1), cif(cdif(c1o, c1), cfv(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, c0)), c1o), c1), wceq(c0, emptycls)), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wn(wceq(c0, emptycls)))
  oev(s0, c0, c1)
  iffalse(cdif(c1o, c1), cfv(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), comu, c0)), c1o), c1), wceq(c0, emptycls))

  sylan9eq((c0[^o]c1), (rec((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[√óo]c0)), 1o)` c1), if(c0 = ‚àÖ,(1o \ c1),(rec((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[√óo]c0)), 1o)` c1)), (c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On), ¬¨ c0 = ‚àÖ)
  oev(s0, c0, c1)

blocks.name: oa0
blocks.content: Addition with zero. Proposition 8.3 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 57. (Contributed by NM, 3-May-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2013.)

blocks.name: om0
blocks.content: Ordinal multiplication with zero. Definition 8.15(a) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 62. See ~ om0x for a way to remove the antecedent ` A e. On ` . (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2013.)

blocks.name: oe0m
blocks.content: Ordinal exponentiation with zero mantissa. (Contributed by NM, 31-Dec-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2013.)

blocks.name: om0x
blocks.content: Ordinal multiplication with zero. Definition 8.15 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 62. Unlike ~ om0 , this version works whether or not ` A ` is an ordinal. However, since it is an artifact of our particular function value definition outside the domain, we will not use it in order to be conventional and present it only as a curiosity. (Contributed by NM, 1-Feb-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: oe0m0
blocks.content: Ordinal exponentiation with zero mantissa and zero exponent. Proposition 8.31 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 67. (Contributed by NM, 31-Dec-2004.)

blocks.name: oe0m1
blocks.content: Ordinal exponentiation with zero mantissa and nonzero exponent. Proposition 8.31(2) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 67 and its converse. (Contributed by NM, 5-Jan-2005.)

blocks.name: oe0
blocks.content: Ordinal exponentiation with zero exponent. Definition 8.30 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 67. (Contributed by NM, 31-Dec-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2013.)

  rdg0((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(hs0[√óo]c0)), c1o)

thm oasuc(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wceq(co(c0, coa, csuc(c1)), csuc(co(c0, coa, c1))))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(c0, coa, csuc(c1)), csuc(co(c0, coa, c1)), cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, csuc(cv(hs0))), c0), csuc(c1)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, csuc(cv(hs0))), cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, csuc(cv(hs0))), c0), c1)), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wceq(cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, csuc(cv(hs0))), c0), csuc(c1)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, csuc(cv(hs0))), cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, csuc(cv(hs0))), c0), c1))))
  rdgsuc(c1, cmpt(hs0, universe, csuc(cv(hs0))), c0)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wceq(co(c0, coa, csuc(c1)), cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, csuc(cv(hs0))), c0), csuc(c1))), wcel(csuc(c1), con0))
  suceloni(c1)
  oav(hs0, c0, csuc(c1))
  syl5eqr(csuc(co(c0, coa, c1)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, csuc(cv(hs0))), cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, csuc(cv(hs0))), c0), c1)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, csuc(cv(hs0))), co(c0, coa, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, csuc(cv(hs0))), co(c0, coa, c1)), csuc(co(c0, coa, c1))), wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, co(c0, coa, c1), universe, cmpt(hs0, universe, csuc(cv(hs0))), csuc(co(c0, coa, c1)), csuc(cv(hs0)))
  suceq(cv(hs0), co(c0, coa, c1))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, universe, csuc(cv(hs0))))
  sucex(co(c0, coa, c1))
  ovex(c0, coa, c1)
  fveq2d(cmpt(hs0, universe, csuc(cv(hs0))), co(c0, coa, c1), cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, csuc(cv(hs0))), c0), c1), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)))
  oav(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, coa, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(csuc(co(c0, coa, c1)))
}

} = {
  3eqtr4d((c0[+o]suc(c1)), suc((c0[+o]c1)), (rec((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ suc(hs0)), c0)` suc(c1)), ((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ suc(hs0))`(rec((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ suc(hs0)), c0)` c1)), (c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On))

  ax-mp(((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ suc(hs0))`(c0[+o]c1))= suc((c0[+o]c1)), (c0[+o]c1)‚àà ùïå)
  fvmpt(hs0, (c0[+o]c1), universe, (hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ suc(hs0)), suc((c0[+o]c1)), suc(hs0))
  suceq(hs0, (c0[+o]c1))

thm oesuclem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  mpan(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, con0), word(c2))

thm oesuclem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c0[^o]suc(c1))=((c0[^o]c1)[√óo]c0))
  ‚ä£ Lim(c2)
  ‚ä£ (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí(rec((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[√óo]c0)), 1o)` suc(c1))=((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[√óo]c0))`(rec((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[√óo]c0)), 1o)` c1)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  oe0lem(c0, c1 ‚àà c2, (c0[^o]suc(c1))=((c0[^o]c1)[√óo]c0))
  eqtr4d((c0[^o]suc(c1)), ((c0[^o]c1)[√óo]c0), emptycls, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c0 = ‚àÖ))
  sylan9eqr((c0[^o]suc(c1)), emptycls, (‚àÖ[^o]suc(c1)), c1 ‚àà c2, c0 = ‚àÖ)
  oveq1(c0, emptycls, coe, suc(c1))
  mpbid(c1 ‚àà c2, (‚àÖ[^o]suc(c1))= ‚àÖ, ‚àÖ ‚àà suc(c1))
  syl(c1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÖ ‚àà suc(c1), Ord(c1))
  mpan(c1 ‚àà c2, Ord(c1), Ord(c2))
  ordelord(c2, c1)
  0elsuc(c1)
  sylbi(c1 ‚àà c2, (‚àÖ ‚àà suc(c1)‚Üî(‚àÖ[^o]suc(c1))= ‚àÖ), suc(c1)‚àà c2)
  syl(suc(c1)‚àà c2, (‚àÖ ‚àà suc(c1)‚Üî(‚àÖ[^o]suc(c1))= ‚àÖ), suc(c1)‚àà On)
  oe0m1(suc(c1))
  sylan9eqr(((c0[^o]c1)[√óo]c0), emptycls, ((‚àÖ[^o]c1)[√óo]‚àÖ), c1 ‚àà c2, c0 = ‚àÖ)
  oveq12d((c0[^o]c1), comu, c0, (‚àÖ[^o]c1), emptycls, c0 = ‚àÖ)
  oveq1(c0, emptycls, coe, c1)
  id(c0 = ‚àÖ)
  syl(c1 ‚àà c2, ((‚àÖ[^o]c1)[√óo]‚àÖ)= ‚àÖ, (‚àÖ[^o]c1)‚àà On)
  mpancom(c1 ‚àà c2, (‚àÖ[^o]c1)‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On)
  oe0lem(c1, c1 ‚àà c2, (‚àÖ[^o]c1)‚àà On)
  adantl(c1 ‚àà c2, c1 = ‚àÖ, (‚àÖ[^o]c1)‚àà On)
  syl6eqel((‚àÖ[^o]c1), con0, (‚àÖ[^o]‚àÖ), c1 = ‚àÖ)
  oveq2(c1, emptycls, emptycls, coe)
  eqeltri((‚àÖ[^o]‚àÖ), con0, c1o)
  oe0m0()
  1on()
  adantll(c1 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÖ ‚àà c1, (‚àÖ[^o]c1)‚àà On)
  syl6eqel((‚àÖ[^o]c1), con0, emptycls, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àà c1))
  biimpa(c1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÖ ‚àà c1, (‚àÖ[^o]c1)= ‚àÖ)
  syl(c1 ‚àà c2, (‚àÖ ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(‚àÖ[^o]c1)= ‚àÖ), c1 ‚àà On)
  oe0m1(c1)
  0elon()
  om0((‚àÖ[^o]c1))
  3eqtr4d((c0[^o]suc(c1)), ((c0[^o]c1)[√óo]c0), (rec((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[√óo]c0)), 1o)` suc(c1)), ((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[√óo]c0))`(rec((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[√óo]c0)), 1o)` c1)), ((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àà c0))
  ad2antlr(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÖ ‚àà c0, (rec((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[√óo]c0)), 1o)` suc(c1))=((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[√óo]c0))`(rec((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[√óo]c0)), 1o)` c1)))
  sylanl2(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÖ ‚àà c0, (c0[^o]suc(c1))=(rec((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[√óo]c0)), 1o)` suc(c1)), suc(c1)‚àà On)
  sylbi(c1 ‚àà c2, suc(c1)‚àà On, suc(c1)‚àà c2)
  ax-mp((c1 ‚àà c2 ‚Üî suc(c1)‚àà c2), Lim(c2))
  limsuc(c2, c1)

  syl5eqr(((c0[^o]c1)[√óo]c0), ((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[√óo]c0))`(rec((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[√óo]c0)), 1o)` c1)), ((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[√óo]c0))`(c0[^o]c1)), ((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àà c0))
  ax-mp(((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[√óo]c0))`(c0[^o]c1))=((c0[^o]c1)[√óo]c0), (c0[^o]c1)‚àà ùïå)
  ovex(c0, coe, c1)
  fvmpt(s0, (c0[^o]c1), universe, (s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[√óo]c0)), ((c0[^o]c1)[√óo]c0), (s0[√óo]c0))
  oveq1(s0, (c0[^o]c1), comu, c0)
  eqid((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[√óo]c0)))
  ovex((c0[^o]c1), comu, c0)
  fveq2d((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[√óo]c0)), (c0[^o]c1), (rec((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[√óo]c0)), 1o)` c1), ((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àà c0))
  sylanl2(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà c2, ‚àÖ ‚àà c0, (c0[^o]c1)=(rec((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s0[√óo]c0)), 1o)` c1), c1 ‚àà On)
  mpan(c1 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà On, Ord(c2))
  ax-mp(Ord(c2), Lim(c2))
  limord(c2)
  ordelon(c2, c1)
  oevn0(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.universe.s(s0)

  diff.co.s(s0, c0, coe, c1)

  diff.comu.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: omsuc
blocks.content: Multiplication with successor. Definition 8.15 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 62. (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2013.)

thm omsuc(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wceq(co(c0, comu, csuc(c1)), co(co(c0, comu, c1), coa, c0)))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(c0, comu, csuc(c1)), co(co(c0, comu, c1), coa, c0), cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), coa, c0)), emptycls), csuc(c1)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), coa, c0)), cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), coa, c0)), emptycls), c1)), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wceq(cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), coa, c0)), emptycls), csuc(c1)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), coa, c0)), cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), coa, c0)), emptycls), c1))))
  rdgsuc(c1, cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), coa, c0)), emptycls)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wceq(co(c0, comu, csuc(c1)), cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), coa, c0)), emptycls), csuc(c1))), wcel(csuc(c1), con0))
  suceloni(c1)
  omv(hs0, c0, csuc(c1))
  syl5eqr(co(co(c0, comu, c1), coa, c0), cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), coa, c0)), cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), coa, c0)), emptycls), c1)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), coa, c0)), co(c0, comu, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), coa, c0)), co(c0, comu, c1)), co(co(c0, comu, c1), coa, c0)), wcel(co(c0, comu, c1), universe))
  ovex(c0, comu, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, co(c0, comu, c1), universe, cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), coa, c0)), co(co(c0, comu, c1), coa, c0), co(cv(hs0), coa, c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), co(c0, comu, c1), coa, c0)
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), coa, c0)))
  ovex(co(c0, comu, c1), coa, c0)
  fveq2d(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), coa, c0)), co(c0, comu, c1), cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), coa, c0)), emptycls), c1), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)))
  omv(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, comu, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(co(co(c0, comu, c1), coa, c0))
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On)‚Üí(c0[√óo]suc(c1))=((c0[√óo]c1)[+o]c0))
} = {
  3eqtr4d((c0[√óo]suc(c1)), ((c0[√óo]c1)[+o]c0), (rec((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(hs0[+o]c0)), ‚àÖ)` suc(c1)), ((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(hs0[+o]c0))`(rec((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(hs0[+o]c0)), ‚àÖ)` c1)), (c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On))

  rdgsuc(c1, (hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(hs0[+o]c0)), emptycls)
  sylan2(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, (c0[√óo]suc(c1))=(rec((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(hs0[+o]c0)), ‚àÖ)` suc(c1)), suc(c1)‚àà On)
  suceloni(c1)
  omv(hs0, c0, suc(c1))
  syl5eqr(((c0[√óo]c1)[+o]c0), ((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(hs0[+o]c0))`(rec((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(hs0[+o]c0)), ‚àÖ)` c1)), ((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(hs0[+o]c0))`(c0[√óo]c1)), (c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On))
  ax-mp(((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(hs0[+o]c0))`(c0[√óo]c1))=((c0[√óo]c1)[+o]c0), (c0[√óo]c1)‚àà ùïå)
  ovex(c0, comu, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, (c0[√óo]c1), universe, (hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(hs0[+o]c0)), ((c0[√óo]c1)[+o]c0), (hs0[+o]c0))
  oveq1(hs0, (c0[√óo]c1), coa, c0)
  eqid((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(hs0[+o]c0)))
  ovex((c0[√óo]c1), coa, c0)
  fveq2d((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(hs0[+o]c0)), (c0[√óo]c1), (rec((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(hs0[+o]c0)), ‚àÖ)` c1), (c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On))
  omv(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(((c0[√óo]c1)[+o]c0))

blocks.name: oesuc
blocks.content: Ordinal exponentiation with a successor exponent. Definition 8.30 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 67. (Contributed by NM, 31-Dec-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2013.)

blocks.name: onasuc
blocks.content: Addition with successor. Theorem 4I(A2) of [Enderton] p. 79. (Note that this version of ~ oasuc does not need Replacement.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm onasuc(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, com)), wceq(co(c0, coa, csuc(c1)), csuc(co(c0, coa, c1))))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(c0, coa, csuc(c1)), csuc(co(c0, coa, c1)), cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, csuc(cv(hs0))), c0), csuc(c1)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, csuc(cv(hs0))), cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, csuc(cv(hs0))), c0), c1)), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, com)))

  3eqtr3d(cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), comu, c0)), c1o), csuc(c1)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), comu, c0)), cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), comu, c0)), c1o), c1)), cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), comu, c0)), c1o), com), csuc(c1)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), comu, c0)), cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), comu, c0)), c1o), com), c1)), wcel(c1, com))

  peano2(c1)
  fveq2d(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), comu, c0)), cfv(cres(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), comu, c0)), c1o), com), c1), cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), comu, c0)), c1o), c1), wcel(c1, com))
  fvres(c1, com, crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cv(hs0), comu, c0)), c1o))

  fvresd(rec((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(hs0[√óo]c0)), 1o), com, suc(c1), c1 ‚àà _om)
  peano2(c1)
  fveq2d((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(hs0[√óo]c0)), ((rec((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(hs0[√óo]c0)), 1o)|` _om)` c1), (rec((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(hs0[√óo]c0)), 1o)` c1), c1 ‚àà _om)
  fvres(c1, com, rec((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(hs0[√óo]c0)), 1o))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

blocks.name: oa1suc
blocks.content: Addition with 1 is same as successor. Proposition 4.34(a) of [Mendelson] p. 266. (Contributed by NM, 29-Oct-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm oa1suc(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wceq(co(c0, coa, c1o), csuc(c0)))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, coa, c1o), csuc(c0), csuc(co(c0, coa, emptycls)), wcel(c0, con0))
  syl5eq(co(c0, coa, c1o), csuc(co(c0, coa, emptycls)), co(c0, coa, csuc(emptycls)), wcel(c0, con0))
  oveq2i(c0, coa, c1o, csuc(emptycls))
  df-1o()
  mpan2(wcel(c0, con0), wceq(co(c0, coa, csuc(emptycls)), csuc(co(c0, coa, emptycls))), wcel(emptycls, com))
  peano1()
  onasuc(c0, emptycls)
  syl(wcel(c0, con0), wceq(csuc(co(c0, coa, emptycls)), csuc(c0)), wceq(co(c0, coa, emptycls), c0))
  oa0(c0)
  suceq(co(c0, coa, emptycls), c0)
}

  eqeq12d(co(c0, coa, c1), ciun(s0, c1, co(c0, coa, cv(s0))), cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, csuc(cv(hs0))), c0), c1), ciun(s0, c1, cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, csuc(cv(hs0))), c0), cv(s0))), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)))

  sylan2(wcel(c0, con0), wa(wcel(c1, con0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), cfv(crdg(cmpt(hs0, universe, csuc(cv(hs0))), c0), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), con0))

  expcom(c0 ‚àà On, (c0[√óo]hs1)‚àà On, ((c0[√óo]hs1)[+o]c0)‚àà On)
  oacl((c0[√óo]hs1), c0)
  eleq1d((c0[√óo]suc(hs1)), con0, ((c0[√óo]hs1)[+o]c0), (c0 ‚àà On ‚àß hs1 ‚àà On))
  omsuc(c0, hs1)
  expcom(Lim(hs0), c0 ‚àà On, (‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà hs0,(c0[√óo]hs1)‚àà On)‚Üí(c0[√óo]hs0)‚àà On))
  syl5ibr((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß Lim(hs0)), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà hs0,(c0[√óo]hs1)‚àà On), (c0[√óo]hs0)‚àà On, ‚ãÉ(hs1 ‚àà hs0,(c0[√óo]hs1))‚àà On)
  mpan(‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà hs0,(c0[√óo]hs1)‚àà On), ‚ãÉ(hs1 ‚àà hs0,(c0[√óo]hs1))‚àà On, hs0 ‚àà ùïå)
  iunon(hs1, hs0, universe, (c0[√óo]hs1))
  eleq1d((c0[√óo]hs0), con0, ‚ãÉ(hs1 ‚àà hs0,(c0[√óo]hs1)), (c0 ‚àà On ‚àß Lim(hs0)))
  mpanr1(c0 ‚àà On, Lim(hs0), (c0[√óo]hs0)= ‚ãÉ(hs1 ‚àà hs0,(c0[√óo]hs1)), hs0 ‚àà ùïå)
  vex(hs0)
  omlim(hs1, c0, hs0, universe)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà On)
  diff.hs0.w((c0[√óo]c1)‚àà On)
  diff.hs0.w((c0[√óo]hs1)‚àà On)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ‚àà On)
  diff.hs1.w((c0[√óo]hs0)‚àà On)

blocks.name: oecl
blocks.content: Closure law for ordinal exponentiation. (Contributed by NM, 1-Jan-2005.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 22-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm oecl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wcel(co(c0, coe, c1), con0))
} = {
  oe0lem(c0, wcel(c1, con0), wcel(co(c0, coe, c1), con0))
  impcom(wcel(c1, con0), wceq(c0, emptycls), wcel(co(c0, coe, c1), con0))
  syl5ibr(wceq(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(co(c0, coe, c1), con0), wcel(co(emptycls, coe, c1), con0))
  anidms(wcel(c1, con0), wcel(co(emptycls, coe, c1), con0))
  oe0lem(c1, wcel(c1, con0), wcel(co(emptycls, coe, c1), con0))
  adantl(wcel(c1, con0), wceq(c1, emptycls), wcel(co(emptycls, coe, c1), con0))
  syl6eqel(co(emptycls, coe, c1), con0, co(emptycls, coe, emptycls), wceq(c1, emptycls))
  oveq2(c1, emptycls, emptycls, coe)
  eqeltri(co(emptycls, coe, emptycls), con0, c1o)
  oe0m0()
  adantll(wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(emptycls, c1), wcel(co(emptycls, coe, c1), con0))
  syl6eqel(co(emptycls, coe, c1), con0, emptycls, wa(wcel(c1, con0), wcel(emptycls, c1)))
  biimpa(wcel(c1, con0), wcel(emptycls, c1), wceq(co(emptycls, coe, c1), emptycls))
  oe0m1(c1)
  0elon()
  eleq1d(co(c0, coe, c1), con0, co(emptycls, coe, c1), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  oveq1(c0, emptycls, coe, c1)
  imp31(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(emptycls, c0), wcel(co(c0, coe, c1), con0))
  com12(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wi(wcel(emptycls, c0), wcel(co(c0, coe, c1), con0)))
  expd(wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c0, con0), wcel(emptycls, c0), wcel(co(c0, coe, c1), con0))
  tfinds3(hs0, hs1, c1, wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(emptycls, c0)), wcel(co(c0, coe, c1), con0), wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), con0), wcel(co(c0, coe, emptycls), con0), wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), con0), wcel(co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1))), con0))
  eleq1d(co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), con0, co(c0, coe, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, c0, coe)
  eleq1d(co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), con0, co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, coe)
  eleq1d(co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), con0, co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1)), c0, coe)
  eleq1d(co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), con0, co(c0, coe, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0, coe)
  adantr(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(emptycls, c0), wcel(co(c0, coe, emptycls), con0))
  syl6eqel(co(c0, coe, emptycls), con0, c1o, wcel(c0, con0))
  oe0(c0)
  1on()
  adantrd(wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wcel(c0, con0), wcel(emptycls, c0), wi(wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), con0), wcel(co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1))), con0)))
  expcom(wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wcel(c0, con0), wi(wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), con0), wcel(co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1))), con0)))
  sylibrd(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cv(hs1), con0)), wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), con0), wcel(co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1))), con0), wcel(co(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), comu, c0), con0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wi(wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), con0), wcel(co(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), comu, c0), con0)))
  expcom(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), con0), wcel(co(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), comu, c0), con0))
  omcl(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), c0)
  eleq1d(co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1))), con0, co(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), comu, c0), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cv(hs1), con0)))
  oesuc(c0, cv(hs1))
  ex(wlim(cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(emptycls, c0)), wi(wral(hs1, cv(hs0), wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), con0)), wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), con0)))
  syl5ibr(wa(wlim(cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(emptycls, c0))), wral(hs1, cv(hs0), wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), con0)), wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), con0), wcel(ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), co(c0, coe, cv(hs1))), con0))
  mpan(wral(hs1, cv(hs0), wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), con0)), wcel(ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), co(c0, coe, cv(hs1))), con0), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  iunon(hs1, cv(hs0), universe, co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)))
  eleq1d(co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), con0, ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), co(c0, coe, cv(hs1))), wa(wlim(cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(emptycls, c0))))
  an12s(wlim(cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, con0), wcel(emptycls, c0), wceq(co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)))))
  anasss(wcel(c0, con0), wlim(cv(hs0)), wcel(emptycls, c0), wceq(co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)))))
  mpanlr1(wcel(c0, con0), wlim(cv(hs0)), wcel(emptycls, c0), wceq(co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  oelim(hs1, c0, cv(hs0), universe)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(emptycls, c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(co(c0, coe, c1), con0))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), con0))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(emptycls, c0)))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), con0))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

thm oecl(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On)‚Üí(c0[^o]c1)‚àà On)
} = {
  oe0lem(c0, c1 ‚àà On, (c0[^o]c1)‚àà On)
  impcom(c1 ‚àà On, c0 = ‚àÖ, (c0[^o]c1)‚àà On)

  anidms(c1 ‚àà On, (‚àÖ[^o]c1)‚àà On)
  oe0lem(c1, c1 ‚àà On, (‚àÖ[^o]c1)‚àà On)

  oe0m0()
  adantll(c1 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, ‚àÖ ‚àà c1, (‚àÖ[^o]c1)‚àà On)
  syl6eqel((‚àÖ[^o]c1), con0, emptycls, (c1 ‚àà On ‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àà c1))
  biimpa(c1 ‚àà On, ‚àÖ ‚àà c1, (‚àÖ[^o]c1)= ‚àÖ)
  oe0m1(c1)
  0elon()
  eleq1d((c0[^o]c1), con0, (‚àÖ[^o]c1), c0 = ‚àÖ)
  oveq1(c0, emptycls, coe, c1)
  imp31(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, ‚àÖ ‚àà c0, (c0[^o]c1)‚àà On)
  com12(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, (‚àÖ ‚àà c0 ‚Üí(c0[^o]c1)‚àà On))
  expd(c1 ‚àà On, c0 ‚àà On, ‚àÖ ‚àà c0, (c0[^o]c1)‚àà On)
  tfinds3(hs0, hs1, c1, (c0 ‚àà On ‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àà c0), (c0[^o]c1)‚àà On, (c0[^o]hs0)‚àà On, (c0[^o]‚àÖ)‚àà On, (c0[^o]hs1)‚àà On, (c0[^o]suc(hs1))‚àà On)
  eleq1d((c0[^o]hs0), con0, (c0[^o]‚àÖ), hs0 = ‚àÖ)
  oveq2(hs0, emptycls, c0, coe)
  eleq1d((c0[^o]hs0), con0, (c0[^o]hs1), hs0 = hs1)
  oveq2(hs0, hs1, c0, coe)
  eleq1d((c0[^o]hs0), con0, (c0[^o]suc(hs1)), hs0 = suc(hs1))
  oveq2(hs0, suc(hs1), c0, coe)
  eleq1d((c0[^o]hs0), con0, (c0[^o]c1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq2(hs0, c1, c0, coe)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà On, ‚àÖ ‚àà c0, (c0[^o]‚àÖ)‚àà On)
  syl6eqel((c0[^o]‚àÖ), con0, c1o, c0 ‚àà On)
  oe0(c0)
  1on()
  adantrd(hs1 ‚àà On, c0 ‚àà On, ‚àÖ ‚àà c0, ((c0[^o]hs1)‚àà On ‚Üí(c0[^o]suc(hs1))‚àà On))
  expcom(hs1 ‚àà On, c0 ‚àà On, ((c0[^o]hs1)‚àà On ‚Üí(c0[^o]suc(hs1))‚àà On))
  sylibrd((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß hs1 ‚àà On), (c0[^o]hs1)‚àà On, (c0[^o]suc(hs1))‚àà On, ((c0[^o]hs1)[√óo]c0)‚àà On)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà On, hs1 ‚àà On, ((c0[^o]hs1)‚àà On ‚Üí((c0[^o]hs1)[√óo]c0)‚àà On))
  expcom(c0 ‚àà On, (c0[^o]hs1)‚àà On, ((c0[^o]hs1)[√óo]c0)‚àà On)
  omcl((c0[^o]hs1), c0)
  eleq1d((c0[^o]suc(hs1)), con0, ((c0[^o]hs1)[√óo]c0), (c0 ‚àà On ‚àß hs1 ‚àà On))
  oesuc(c0, hs1)

  syl5ibr((Lim(hs0)‚àß(c0 ‚àà On ‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àà c0)), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà hs0,(c0[^o]hs1)‚àà On), (c0[^o]hs0)‚àà On, ‚ãÉ(hs1 ‚àà hs0,(c0[^o]hs1))‚àà On)
  mpan(‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà hs0,(c0[^o]hs1)‚àà On), ‚ãÉ(hs1 ‚àà hs0,(c0[^o]hs1))‚àà On, hs0 ‚àà ùïå)
  iunon(hs1, hs0, universe, (c0[^o]hs1))
  eleq1d((c0[^o]hs0), con0, ‚ãÉ(hs1 ‚àà hs0,(c0[^o]hs1)), (Lim(hs0)‚àß(c0 ‚àà On ‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àà c0)))

  anasss(c0 ‚àà On, Lim(hs0), ‚àÖ ‚àà c0, (c0[^o]hs0)= ‚ãÉ(hs1 ‚àà hs0,(c0[^o]hs1)))
  mpanlr1(c0 ‚àà On, Lim(hs0), ‚àÖ ‚àà c0, (c0[^o]hs0)= ‚ãÉ(hs1 ‚àà hs0,(c0[^o]hs1)), hs0 ‚àà ùïå)
  vex(hs0)
  oelim(hs1, c0, hs0, universe)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àà c0))
  diff.hs0.w((c0[^o]c1)‚àà On)
  diff.hs0.w((c0[^o]hs1)‚àà On)

blocks.name: oa0r
blocks.content: Ordinal addition with zero. Proposition 8.3 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 57. (Contributed by NM, 5-May-1995.)
blocks.origin:
thm oa0r(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, c0), c0))
} = {
  tfinds(hs0, hs1, c0, wceq(co(emptycls, coa, c0), c0), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, emptycls), emptycls), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), csuc(cv(hs1))))
  eqeq12d(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), co(emptycls, coa, emptycls), emptycls, wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, emptycls, coa)
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  eqeq12d(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), emptycls, coa)
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  eqeq12d(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), co(emptycls, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), csuc(cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1)), emptycls, coa)
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))))
  eqeq12d(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), co(emptycls, coa, c0), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c0, emptycls, coa)
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  ax-mp(wceq(co(emptycls, coa, emptycls), emptycls), wcel(emptycls, con0))
  oa0(emptycls)
  ex(wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), csuc(cv(hs1))))
  sylan9eq(co(emptycls, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), csuc(cv(hs1)), csuc(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)))
  mpan(wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), csuc(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs1)))), wcel(emptycls, con0))
  oasuc(emptycls, cv(hs1))
  suceq(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1))
  syl5ibr(wlim(cv(hs0)), wral(hs1, cv(hs0), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1))), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs1))), cuni(cv(hs0))))
  syl6eqr(ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs1))), cuni(cv(hs0)), ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wral(hs1, cv(hs0), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1))))
  iuneq2(hs1, cv(hs0), co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1))
  uniiun(hs1, cv(hs0))
  eqeq12d(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs1))), cuni(cv(hs0)), wlim(cv(hs0)))
  mpan(wlim(cv(hs0)), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs0)), ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  mpan(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wlim(cv(hs0))), wceq(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs0)), ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs1)))), wcel(emptycls, con0))
  0elon()
  oalim(hs1, emptycls, cv(hs0), universe)
  limuni(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(emptycls, coa, c0), c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(co(emptycls, coa, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(emptycls)
}

thm oa0r(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà On ‚Üí(‚àÖ[+o]c0)= c0)
} = {
  tfinds(hs0, hs1, c0, (‚àÖ[+o]c0)= c0, (‚àÖ[+o]hs0)= hs0, (‚àÖ[+o]‚àÖ)= ‚àÖ, (‚àÖ[+o]hs1)= hs1, (‚àÖ[+o]suc(hs1))= suc(hs1))

  oveq2(hs0, emptycls, emptycls, coa)
  id(hs0 = ‚àÖ)
  eqeq12d((‚àÖ[+o]hs0), hs0, (‚àÖ[+o]hs1), hs1, hs0 = hs1)

  id(hs0 = hs1)
  eqeq12d((‚àÖ[+o]hs0), hs0, (‚àÖ[+o]suc(hs1)), suc(hs1), hs0 = suc(hs1))

  id(hs0 = suc(hs1))
  eqeq12d((‚àÖ[+o]hs0), hs0, (‚àÖ[+o]c0), c0, hs0 = c0)
  oveq2(hs0, c0, emptycls, coa)
  id(hs0 = c0)
  ax-mp((‚àÖ[+o]‚àÖ)= ‚àÖ, ‚àÖ ‚àà On)
  oa0(emptycls)

blocks.name: o2p2e4
blocks.content: 2 + 2 = 4 for ordinal numbers. Ordinal numbers are modeled as Von Neumann ordinals; see ~ df-suc . For the usual proof using complex numbers, see ~ 2p2e4 . (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-2021.)

  orim12d((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On), c0 = c1, c1 ‚àà c0, (c2[+o]c0)=(c2[+o]c1), (c2[+o]c1)‚àà(c2[+o]c0))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On), (c0 = c1 ‚Üí(c2[+o]c0)=(c2[+o]c1)))
  oveq2(c0, c1, c2, coa)
  3adant2(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, c2 ‚àà On, (c1 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí(c2[+o]c1)‚àà(c2[+o]c0)))
  oaordi(c0, c2, c1)
  syl((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On), ((c2[+o]c0)‚àà(c2[+o]c1)‚Üî ¬¨((c2[+o]c0)=(c2[+o]c1)‚à®(c2[+o]c1)‚àà(c2[+o]c0))), (Ord((c2[+o]c0))‚àß Ord((c2[+o]c1))))
  sylbi((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On), (Ord((c2[+o]c0))‚àß Ord((c2[+o]c1))), ((c2 ‚àà On ‚àß c0 ‚àà On)‚àß(c2 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On)))
  3bitri((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On), ((c2 ‚àà On ‚àß c0 ‚àà On)‚àß(c2 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On)), ((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On)‚àß c2 ‚àà On), (c2 ‚àà On ‚àß(c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On)))
  df-3an(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, c2 ‚àà On)

  oacl(c2, c0)
  eloni((c2[+o]c0))

  ordtri2((c2[+o]c0), (c2[+o]c1))
  syl((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî ¬¨(c0 = c1 ‚à® c1 ‚àà c0)), (Ord(c0)‚àß Ord(c1)))
  3adant3(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, c2 ‚àà On, (Ord(c0)‚àß Ord(c1)))
  anim12i(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, Ord(c0), Ord(c1))
  eloni(c0)
  eloni(c1)

}

blocks.name: oacan
blocks.content: Left cancellation law for ordinal addition. Corollary 8.5 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 58. (Contributed by NM, 5-Dec-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm oacan(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wb(wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c0, coa, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))
} = {
  3bitr4rd(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c0, coa, c2)), wceq(c1, c2), wn(wo(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c1))), wn(wo(wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c0, coa, c2)), wcel(co(c0, coa, c2), co(c0, coa, c1)))))
  notbid(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wo(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c1)), wo(wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c0, coa, c2)), wcel(co(c0, coa, c2), co(c0, coa, c1))))
  orbi12d(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c0, coa, c2)), wcel(co(c0, coa, c2), co(c0, coa, c1)))
  3comr(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wb(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c0, coa, c2))))
  oaord(c1, c2, c0)
  3com13(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wb(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(co(c0, coa, c2), co(c0, coa, c1))))
  oaord(c2, c1, c0)
  3adant1(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wb(wceq(c1, c2), wn(wo(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c1)))))
  syl2an(wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wb(wceq(c1, c2), wn(wo(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c1)))), word(c1), word(c2))
  eloni(c1)
  eloni(c2)
  ordtri3(c1, c2)
  3impdi(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wb(wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c0, coa, c2)), wn(wo(wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c0, coa, c2)), wcel(co(c0, coa, c2), co(c0, coa, c1))))))
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wb(wceq(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c0, coa, c2)), wn(wo(wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c0, coa, c2)), wcel(co(c0, coa, c2), co(c0, coa, c1))))), word(co(c0, coa, c1)), word(co(c0, coa, c2)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), word(co(c0, coa, c1)), wcel(co(c0, coa, c1), con0))
  oacl(c0, c1)
  eloni(co(c0, coa, c1))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), word(co(c0, coa, c2)), wcel(co(c0, coa, c2), con0))
  oacl(c0, c2)
  eloni(co(c0, coa, c2))
  ordtri3(co(c0, coa, c1), co(c0, coa, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm oacan(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On)‚Üí((c0[+o]c1)=(c0[+o]c2)‚Üî c1 = c2))
} = {
  3bitr4rd((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On), (c0[+o]c1)=(c0[+o]c2), c1 = c2, ¬¨(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚à® c2 ‚àà c1), ¬¨((c0[+o]c1)‚àà(c0[+o]c2)‚à®(c0[+o]c2)‚àà(c0[+o]c1)))
  notbid((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On), (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚à® c2 ‚àà c1), ((c0[+o]c1)‚àà(c0[+o]c2)‚à®(c0[+o]c2)‚àà(c0[+o]c1)))
  orbi12d((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On), c1 ‚àà c2, c2 ‚àà c1, (c0[+o]c1)‚àà(c0[+o]c2), (c0[+o]c2)‚àà(c0[+o]c1))
  3comr(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, c2 ‚àà On, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚Üî(c0[+o]c1)‚àà(c0[+o]c2)))
  oaord(c1, c2, c0)
  3com13(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, c2 ‚àà On, (c2 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(c0[+o]c2)‚àà(c0[+o]c1)))
  oaord(c2, c1, c0)
  3adant1(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, c2 ‚àà On, (c1 = c2 ‚Üî ¬¨(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚à® c2 ‚àà c1)))
  syl2an(c1 ‚àà On, c2 ‚àà On, (c1 = c2 ‚Üî ¬¨(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚à® c2 ‚àà c1)), Ord(c1), Ord(c2))
  eloni(c1)
  eloni(c2)
  ordtri3(c1, c2)
  3impdi(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, c2 ‚àà On, ((c0[+o]c1)=(c0[+o]c2)‚Üî ¬¨((c0[+o]c1)‚àà(c0[+o]c2)‚à®(c0[+o]c2)‚àà(c0[+o]c1))))
  syl2an((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On), (c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On), ((c0[+o]c1)=(c0[+o]c2)‚Üî ¬¨((c0[+o]c1)‚àà(c0[+o]c2)‚à®(c0[+o]c2)‚àà(c0[+o]c1))), Ord((c0[+o]c1)), Ord((c0[+o]c2)))
  syl((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On), Ord((c0[+o]c1)), (c0[+o]c1)‚àà On)
  oacl(c0, c1)
  eloni((c0[+o]c1))
  syl((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On), Ord((c0[+o]c2)), (c0[+o]c2)‚àà On)
  oacl(c0, c2)
  eloni((c0[+o]c2))
  ordtri3((c0[+o]c1), (c0[+o]c2))
}

blocks.name: oaword
blocks.content: Weak ordering property of ordinal addition. (Contributed by NM, 6-Dec-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 22-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm oaword(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wb(wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c2, coa, c0), co(c2, coa, c1))))
} = {
  3bitr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c2, coa, c0), co(c2, coa, c1)), wn(wcel(c1, c0)), wn(wcel(co(c2, coa, c1), co(c2, coa, c0))))
  notbid(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(co(c2, coa, c1), co(c2, coa, c0)))
  3com12(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wb(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(co(c2, coa, c1), co(c2, coa, c0))))
  oaord(c1, c0, c2)
  3adant3(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wb(wss(c0, c1), wn(wcel(c1, c0))))
  ontri1(c0, c1)
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wb(wss(co(c2, coa, c0), co(c2, coa, c1)), wn(wcel(co(c2, coa, c1), co(c2, coa, c0)))), wcel(co(c2, coa, c0), con0), wcel(co(c2, coa, c1), con0))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wcel(co(c2, coa, c0), con0))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wcel(co(c2, coa, c0), con0))
  oacl(c2, c0)
  3adant1(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wcel(co(c2, coa, c1), con0))
  ancoms(wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wcel(co(c2, coa, c1), con0))
  oacl(c2, c1)
  ontri1(co(c2, coa, c0), co(c2, coa, c1))
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On)‚Üí(c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚Üî(c2[+o]c0)‚äÜ(c2[+o]c1)))

  3com12(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, c2 ‚àà On, (c1 ‚àà c0 ‚Üî(c2[+o]c1)‚àà(c2[+o]c0)))

  3adant2(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, c2 ‚àà On, (c2[+o]c0)‚àà On)

blocks.name: oawordri
blocks.content: Weak ordering property of ordinal addition. Proposition 8.7 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 59. (Contributed by NM, 7-Dec-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm oawordri(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c0, coa, c2), co(c1, coa, c2))))
} = {
  3imp231(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c0, coa, c2), co(c1, coa, c2))))
  exp4c(wcel(c2, con0), wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c0, coa, c2), co(c1, coa, c2)))
  tfinds3(hs0, hs1, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wss(c0, c1)), wss(co(c0, coa, c2), co(c1, coa, c2)), wss(co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)), co(c1, coa, cv(hs0))), wss(co(c0, coa, emptycls), co(c1, coa, emptycls)), wss(co(c0, coa, cv(hs1)), co(c1, coa, cv(hs1))), wss(co(c0, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), co(c1, coa, csuc(cv(hs1)))))
  sseq12d(co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)), co(c1, coa, cv(hs0)), co(c0, coa, emptycls), co(c1, coa, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, c0, coa)
  oveq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, c1, coa)
  sseq12d(co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)), co(c1, coa, cv(hs0)), co(c0, coa, cv(hs1)), co(c1, coa, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, coa)
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c1, coa)
  sseq12d(co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)), co(c1, coa, cv(hs0)), co(c0, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), co(c1, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1)), c0, coa)
  oveq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1)), c1, coa)
  sseq12d(co(c0, coa, cv(hs0)), co(c1, coa, cv(hs0)), co(c0, coa, c2), co(c1, coa, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c2, c0, coa)
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c2, c1, coa)
  biimpar(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c0, coa, emptycls), co(c1, coa, emptycls)))
  sseq12d(co(c0, coa, emptycls), co(c1, coa, emptycls), c0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wceq(co(c0, coa, emptycls), c0))
  oa0(c0)
  adantl(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wceq(co(c1, coa, emptycls), c1))
  oa0(c1)
  adantrd(wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wss(c0, c1), wi(wss(co(c0, coa, cv(hs1)), co(c1, coa, cv(hs1))), wss(co(c0, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), co(c1, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))))))
  expcom(wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wi(wss(co(c0, coa, cv(hs1)), co(c1, coa, cv(hs1))), wss(co(c0, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), co(c1, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))))))
  biimpd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wcel(cv(hs1), con0)), wss(co(c0, coa, cv(hs1)), co(c1, coa, cv(hs1))), wss(co(c0, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), co(c1, coa, csuc(cv(hs1)))))
  bitr4d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wcel(cv(hs1), con0)), wss(co(c0, coa, cv(hs1)), co(c1, coa, cv(hs1))), wss(co(c0, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), co(c1, coa, csuc(cv(hs1)))), wss(csuc(co(c0, coa, cv(hs1))), csuc(co(c1, coa, cv(hs1)))))
  anandirs(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wb(wss(co(c0, coa, cv(hs1)), co(c1, coa, cv(hs1))), wss(csuc(co(c0, coa, cv(hs1))), csuc(co(c1, coa, cv(hs1))))))
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cv(hs1), con0)), wa(wcel(c1, con0), wcel(cv(hs1), con0)), wb(wss(co(c0, coa, cv(hs1)), co(c1, coa, cv(hs1))), wss(csuc(co(c0, coa, cv(hs1))), csuc(co(c1, coa, cv(hs1))))), word(co(c0, coa, cv(hs1))), word(co(c1, coa, cv(hs1))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cv(hs1), con0)), word(co(c0, coa, cv(hs1))), wcel(co(c0, coa, cv(hs1)), con0))
  oacl(c0, cv(hs1))
  eloni(co(c0, coa, cv(hs1)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c1, con0), wcel(cv(hs1), con0)), word(co(c1, coa, cv(hs1))), wcel(co(c1, coa, cv(hs1)), con0))
  oacl(c1, cv(hs1))
  eloni(co(c1, coa, cv(hs1)))
  ordsucsssuc(co(c0, coa, cv(hs1)), co(c1, coa, cv(hs1)))
  sseq12d(co(c0, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), co(c1, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), csuc(co(c0, coa, cv(hs1))), csuc(co(c1, coa, cv(hs1))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wcel(cv(hs1), con0)))
  adantlr(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wceq(co(c0, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), csuc(co(c0, coa, cv(hs1)))))
  oasuc(c0, cv(hs1))

blocks.name: oaord1
blocks.content: An ordinal is less than its sum with a nonzero ordinal. Theorem 18 of [Suppes] p. 209 and its converse. (Contributed by NM, 6-Dec-2004.)

blocks.name: oaword1
blocks.content: An ordinal is less than or equal to its sum with another. Part of Exercise 5 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 62. (For the other part see ~ oaord1 .) (Contributed by NM, 6-Dec-2004.)

blocks.name: oawordeu
blocks.content: Existence theorem for weak ordering of ordinal sum. Proposition 8.8 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 59. (Contributed by NM, 11-Dec-2004.)

thm oawordeu(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wss(c0, c1)), wreu(s0, con0, wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wss(c0, c1), wreu(s0, con0, wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1)))
  dedth2h(c0, emptycls, c1, emptycls, wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wi(wss(c0, c1), wreu(s0, con0, wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1))), wi(wss(cif(c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, con0)), c1), wreu(s0, con0, wceq(co(cif(c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, con0)), coa, cv(s0)), c1))), wi(wss(cif(c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, con0)), cif(c1, emptycls, wcel(c1, con0))), wreu(s0, con0, wceq(co(cif(c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, con0)), coa, cv(s0)), cif(c1, emptycls, wcel(c1, con0))))))
  imbi12d(wceq(c0, cif(c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, con0))), wss(c0, c1), wreu(s0, con0, wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1)), wss(cif(c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, con0)), c1), wreu(s0, con0, wceq(co(cif(c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, con0)), coa, cv(s0)), c1)))

  reubidv(s0, con0, wceq(c0, cif(c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, con0))), wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1), wceq(co(cif(c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, con0)), coa, cv(s0)), c1))

  sseq1(c0, if(c0 ‚àà On, c0, ‚àÖ), c1)
  reubidv(s0, con0, c0 = if(c0 ‚àà On, c0, ‚àÖ), (c0[+o]s0)= c1, (if(c0 ‚àà On, c0, ‚àÖ)[+o]s0)= c1)
  eqeq1d((c0[+o]s0), c1, (if(c0 ‚àà On, c0, ‚àÖ)[+o]s0), c0 = if(c0 ‚àà On, c0, ‚àÖ))
  oveq1(c0, if(c0 ‚àà On, c0, ‚àÖ), coa, s0)

  sseq2(c1, if(c1 ‚àà On, c1, ‚àÖ), if(c0 ‚àà On, c0, ‚àÖ))
  reubidv(s0, con0, c1 = if(c1 ‚àà On, c1, ‚àÖ), (if(c0 ‚àà On, c0, ‚àÖ)[+o]s0)= c1, (if(c0 ‚àà On, c0, ‚àÖ)[+o]s0)= if(c1 ‚àà On, c1, ‚àÖ))
  eqeq2(c1, if(c1 ‚àà On, c1, ‚àÖ), (if(c0 ‚àà On, c0, ‚àÖ)[+o]s0))
  oawordeulem(s0, hs0, if(c0 ‚àà On, c0, ‚àÖ), if(c1 ‚àà On, c1, ‚àÖ), { hs0 ‚àà On | if(c1 ‚àà On, c1, ‚àÖ)‚äÜ(if(c0 ‚àà On, c0, ‚àÖ)[+o]hs0)})
  elimel(c0, con0, emptycls)
  elimel(c1, con0, emptycls)
  0elon()
  eqid({ hs0 ‚àà On | if(c1 ‚àà On, c1, ‚àÖ)‚äÜ(if(c0 ‚àà On, c0, ‚àÖ)[+o]hs0)})

thm oawordexr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {

  oaword1(c0, cv(s0))

  ex(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wss(c0, c1), wreu(s0, con0, wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c1)))

blocks.content: Ordinal addition is associative. Theorem 25 of [Suppes] p. 211. (Contributed by NM, 10-Dec-2004.)

blocks.name: oarec
blocks.content: Recursive definition of ordinal addition. Exercise 25 of [Enderton] p. 240. (Contributed by NM, 26-Dec-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2015.)

blocks.name: oaf1o
blocks.content: Left addition by a constant is a bijection from ordinals to ordinals greater than the constant. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm oaf1o(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wf1o(cmpt(s0, con0, co(c0, coa, cv(s0))), con0, cdif(con0, c0)))

  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, con0), wf1o(cmpt(s0, con0, co(c0, coa, cv(s0))), con0, cdif(con0, c0)), wral(s0, con0, wcel(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), cdif(con0, c0))), wral(hs0, cdif(con0, c0), wreu(s0, con0, wceq(cv(hs0), co(c0, coa, cv(s0))))))
  ralrimiva(s0, con0, wcel(c0, con0), wcel(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), cdif(con0, c0)))
  eldifd(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), con0, c0, wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cv(s0), con0)))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cv(s0), con0)), wn(wcel(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c0)), wss(c0, co(c0, coa, cv(s0))))
  oaword1(c0, cv(s0))
  syldan(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cv(s0), con0), wb(wss(c0, co(c0, coa, cv(s0))), wn(wcel(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), c0))), wcel(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), con0))
  oacl(c0, cv(s0))
  ontri1(c0, co(c0, coa, cv(s0)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cdif(con0, c0), wcel(c0, con0), wreu(s0, con0, wceq(cv(hs0), co(c0, coa, cv(s0)))))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(con0, c0))), wreu(s0, con0, wceq(cv(hs0), co(c0, coa, cv(s0)))), wreu(s0, con0, wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))
  syl21anc(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(con0, c0))), wreu(s0, con0, wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wss(c0, cv(hs0)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(con0, c0)))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(con0, c0))), wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(con0, c0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  eldifn(cv(hs0), con0, c0)
  syldan(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(con0, c0)), wb(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), con0))
  adantl(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(con0, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0))
  eldifi(cv(hs0), con0, c0)
  ontri1(c0, cv(hs0))
  oawordeu(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  reubii(s0, con0, wceq(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(c0, coa, cv(s0))))
  eqcom(co(c0, coa, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))

  eqid(cmpt(s0, con0, co(c0, coa, cv(s0))))

  diff.con0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, con0, co(c0, coa, cv(s0))))

  syl(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wb(wceq(cin(crn(c2), c1), emptycls), wss(crn(c2), cdif(con0, c1))), wss(crn(c2), con0))
  difss2d(crn(c2), con0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)))
  3syl(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wss(crn(c2), cdif(con0, c1)), wf1(c2, c0, cdif(con0, c1)), wf(c2, c0, cdif(con0, c1)))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wf1(c2, c0, cdif(con0, c1)), wf1(cres(cmpt(s0, con0, co(c1, coa, cv(s0))), c0), c0, cdif(con0, c1)))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wf1(cres(cmpt(s0, con0, co(c1, coa, cv(s0))), c0), c0, cdif(con0, c1)), wf1(cmpt(s0, con0, co(c1, coa, cv(s0))), con0, cdif(con0, c1)), wss(c0, con0))

  f1ssres(cmpt(s0, con0, co(c1, coa, cv(s0))), con0, cdif(con0, c1), c0)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wb(wf1(cres(cmpt(s0, con0, co(c1, coa, cv(s0))), c0), c0, cdif(con0, c1)), wf1(c2, c0, cdif(con0, c1))), wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, con0, co(c1, coa, cv(s0))), c0), c2))
  syl6eqr(cres(cmpt(s0, con0, co(c1, coa, cv(s0))), c0), c2, cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, coa, cv(s0))), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)))
  resmptd(s0, con0, co(c1, coa, cv(s0)), c0, wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wss(c0, con0))
  onss(c0)
  f1eq1(cres(cmpt(s0, con0, co(c1, coa, cv(s0))), c0), c2, c0, cdif(con0, c1))
  f1f(c2, c0, cdif(con0, c1))
  frn(c2, c0, cdif(con0, c1))
  reldisj(crn(c2), con0, c1)
  diff.con0.s(s0)
}

blocks.content: Define a bijection from ` A +o B ` to ` B +o A ` . Thus, the two are equinumerous even if they are not equal (which sometimes occurs, e.g., ~ oancom ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2015.)

blocks.name: omordi
blocks.content: Ordering property of ordinal multiplication. Half of Proposition 8.19 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 63. (Contributed by NM, 14-Dec-2004.)

  ancoms((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On), c2 ‚àà On, ((c2[√óo]c0)‚àà(c2[√óo]c1)‚Üî ¬¨((c2[√óo]c0)=(c2[√óo]c1)‚à®(c2[√óo]c1)‚àà(c2[√óo]c0))))
  anandis(c2 ‚àà On, c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, ((c2[√óo]c0)‚àà(c2[√óo]c1)‚Üî ¬¨((c2[√óo]c0)=(c2[√óo]c1)‚à®(c2[√óo]c1)‚àà(c2[√óo]c0))))
  syl2an((c2 ‚àà On ‚àß c0 ‚àà On), (c2 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On), ((c2[√óo]c0)‚àà(c2[√óo]c1)‚Üî ¬¨((c2[√óo]c0)=(c2[√óo]c1)‚à®(c2[√óo]c1)‚àà(c2[√óo]c0))), (c2[√óo]c0)‚àà On, (c2[√óo]c1)‚àà On)
  omcl(c2, c0)
  omcl(c2, c1)
  syl2an((c2[√óo]c0)‚àà On, (c2[√óo]c1)‚àà On, ((c2[√óo]c0)‚àà(c2[√óo]c1)‚Üî ¬¨((c2[√óo]c0)=(c2[√óo]c1)‚à®(c2[√óo]c1)‚àà(c2[√óo]c0))), Ord((c2[√óo]c0)), Ord((c2[√óo]c1)))
  eloni((c2[√óo]c0))
  eloni((c2[√óo]c1))
  ordtri2((c2[√óo]c0), (c2[√óo]c1))
  adantr((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On), ‚àÖ ‚àà c2, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî ¬¨(c0 = c1 ‚à® c1 ‚àà c0)))
  3adant3(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, c2 ‚àà On, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî ¬¨(c0 = c1 ‚à® c1 ‚àà c0)))
  syl2an(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî ¬¨(c0 = c1 ‚à® c1 ‚àà c0)), Ord(c0), Ord(c1))
  eloni(c0)
  eloni(c1)
  ordtri2(c0, c1)

blocks.name: omord
blocks.content: Ordering property of ordinal multiplication. Proposition 8.19 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 63. (Contributed by NM, 14-Dec-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm omord(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wb(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(emptycls, c2)), wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1))))
} = {
  bitrd(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(emptycls, c2)), wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)), wa(wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)), wcel(emptycls, c2)))
  pm5.32rd(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(emptycls, c2), wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)))
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wcel(emptycls, c2), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1))))
  omord2(c0, c1, c2)
  impbid2(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wa(wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)), wcel(emptycls, c2)), wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)))
  simpl(wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)), wcel(emptycls, c2))
  ancld(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)), wcel(emptycls, c2))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wi(wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)), wcel(emptycls, c2)))
  sylibrd(wa(wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)), wcel(emptycls, c2), wne(c2, emptycls))
  adantr(wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wi(wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)), wne(c2, emptycls)))
  syl5(wcel(c1, con0), wcel(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1)), wne(c2, emptycls), wne(co(c2, comu, c1), emptycls))
  ne0i(co(c2, comu, c0), co(c2, comu, c1))
  necon3d(co(c2, comu, c1), emptycls, c2, emptycls, wcel(c1, con0))
  syl5ibrcom(wcel(c1, con0), wceq(c2, emptycls), wceq(co(c2, comu, c1), emptycls), wceq(co(emptycls, comu, c1), emptycls))
  om0r(c1)
  eqeq1d(co(c2, comu, c1), emptycls, co(emptycls, comu, c1), wceq(c2, emptycls))
  oveq1(c2, emptycls, comu, c1)
  adantl(wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wb(wcel(emptycls, c2), wne(c2, emptycls)))
  on0eln0(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm omord(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On)‚Üí((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àà c2)‚Üî(c2[√óo]c0)‚àà(c2[√óo]c1)))

  simpl((c2[√óo]c0)‚àà(c2[√óo]c1), ‚àÖ ‚àà c2)

  3adant1(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, c2 ‚àà On, ((c2[√óo]c0)‚àà(c2[√óo]c1)‚Üí ‚àÖ ‚àà c2))
  sylibrd((c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On), (c2[√óo]c0)‚àà(c2[√óo]c1), ‚àÖ ‚àà c2, c2 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  adantr(c1 ‚àà On, c2 ‚àà On, ((c2[√óo]c0)‚àà(c2[√óo]c1)‚Üí c2 ‚â† ‚àÖ))
  syl5(c1 ‚àà On, (c2[√óo]c0)‚àà(c2[√óo]c1), c2 ‚â† ‚àÖ, (c2[√óo]c1)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  ne0i((c2[√óo]c0), (c2[√óo]c1))
  necon3d((c2[√óo]c1), emptycls, c2, emptycls, c1 ‚àà On)
  syl5ibrcom(c1 ‚àà On, c2 = ‚àÖ, (c2[√óo]c1)= ‚àÖ, (‚àÖ[√óo]c1)= ‚àÖ)
  om0r(c1)
  eqeq1d((c2[√óo]c1), emptycls, (‚àÖ[√óo]c1), c2 = ‚àÖ)
  oveq1(c2, emptycls, comu, c1)

blocks.name: omcan
blocks.content: Left cancellation law for ordinal multiplication. Proposition 8.20 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 63 and its converse. (Contributed by NM, 14-Dec-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm omcan(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wcel(emptycls, c0)), wb(wceq(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))
} = {
  impbid1(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wcel(emptycls, c0)), wceq(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
  3imtr4d(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wcel(emptycls, c0)), wceq(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)), wceq(c1, c2), wn(wo(wcel(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)), wcel(co(c0, comu, c2), co(c0, comu, c1)))), wn(wo(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c1))))
  con3d(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wcel(emptycls, c0)), wo(wcel(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)), wcel(co(c0, comu, c2), co(c0, comu, c1))), wo(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c1)))
  orim12d(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wcel(emptycls, c0)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)), wcel(co(c0, comu, c2), co(c0, comu, c1)))
  imp(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wcel(emptycls, c0), wi(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2))))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wi(wcel(emptycls, c0), wi(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)))))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wi(wcel(emptycls, c0), wi(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)))))
  ex(wa(wcel(c2, con0), wcel(c0, con0)), wcel(emptycls, c0), wi(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2))))
  omordi(c2, c0, c1)
  imp(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wcel(emptycls, c0), wi(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(co(c0, comu, c2), co(c0, comu, c1))))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wi(wcel(emptycls, c0), wi(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(co(c0, comu, c2), co(c0, comu, c1)))))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wi(wcel(emptycls, c0), wi(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(co(c0, comu, c2), co(c0, comu, c1)))))
  ex(wa(wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c0, con0)), wcel(emptycls, c0), wi(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(co(c0, comu, c2), co(c0, comu, c1))))
  omordi(c1, c0, c2)
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wcel(emptycls, c0), wb(wceq(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)), wn(wo(wcel(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)), wcel(co(c0, comu, c2), co(c0, comu, c1))))))
  3impdi(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wb(wceq(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)), wn(wo(wcel(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)), wcel(co(c0, comu, c2), co(c0, comu, c1))))))
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wb(wceq(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)), wn(wo(wcel(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2)), wcel(co(c0, comu, c2), co(c0, comu, c1))))), word(co(c0, comu, c1)), word(co(c0, comu, c2)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), word(co(c0, comu, c1)), wcel(co(c0, comu, c1), con0))
  omcl(c0, c1)
  eloni(co(c0, comu, c1))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), word(co(c0, comu, c2)), wcel(co(c0, comu, c2), con0))
  omcl(c0, c2)
  eloni(co(c0, comu, c2))
  ordtri3(co(c0, comu, c1), co(c0, comu, c2))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wcel(emptycls, c0), wb(wceq(c1, c2), wn(wo(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c1)))))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wb(wceq(c1, c2), wn(wo(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c1)))))
  syl2an(wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wb(wceq(c1, c2), wn(wo(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c1)))), word(c1), word(c2))
  eloni(c1)
  eloni(c2)
  ordtri3(c1, c2)
  oveq2(c1, c2, c0, comu)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm omcan(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On)‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àà c0)‚Üí((c0[√óo]c1)=(c0[√óo]c2)‚Üî c1 = c2))
} = {
  impbid1(((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On)‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àà c0), (c0[√óo]c1)=(c0[√óo]c2), c1 = c2)
  3imtr4d(((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On)‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àà c0), (c0[√óo]c1)=(c0[√óo]c2), c1 = c2, ¬¨((c0[√óo]c1)‚àà(c0[√óo]c2)‚à®(c0[√óo]c2)‚àà(c0[√óo]c1)), ¬¨(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚à® c2 ‚àà c1))
  con3d(((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On)‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àà c0), ((c0[√óo]c1)‚àà(c0[√óo]c2)‚à®(c0[√óo]c2)‚àà(c0[√óo]c1)), (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚à® c2 ‚àà c1))
  orim12d(((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On)‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àà c0), c1 ‚àà c2, c2 ‚àà c1, (c0[√óo]c1)‚àà(c0[√óo]c2), (c0[√óo]c2)‚àà(c0[√óo]c1))
  imp((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On), ‚àÖ ‚àà c0, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí(c0[√óo]c1)‚àà(c0[√óo]c2)))
  3adant2(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, c2 ‚àà On, (‚àÖ ‚àà c0 ‚Üí(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí(c0[√óo]c1)‚àà(c0[√óo]c2))))
  ancoms(c0 ‚àà On, c2 ‚àà On, (‚àÖ ‚àà c0 ‚Üí(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí(c0[√óo]c1)‚àà(c0[√óo]c2))))
  ex((c2 ‚àà On ‚àß c0 ‚àà On), ‚àÖ ‚àà c0, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí(c0[√óo]c1)‚àà(c0[√óo]c2)))
  omordi(c2, c0, c1)
  imp((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On), ‚àÖ ‚àà c0, (c2 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c0[√óo]c2)‚àà(c0[√óo]c1)))
  3adant3(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, c2 ‚àà On, (‚àÖ ‚àà c0 ‚Üí(c2 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c0[√óo]c2)‚àà(c0[√óo]c1))))
  ancoms(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, (‚àÖ ‚àà c0 ‚Üí(c2 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c0[√óo]c2)‚àà(c0[√óo]c1))))
  ex((c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c0 ‚àà On), ‚àÖ ‚àà c0, (c2 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c0[√óo]c2)‚àà(c0[√óo]c1)))
  omordi(c1, c0, c2)

  3impdi(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, c2 ‚àà On, ((c0[√óo]c1)=(c0[√óo]c2)‚Üî ¬¨((c0[√óo]c1)‚àà(c0[√óo]c2)‚à®(c0[√óo]c2)‚àà(c0[√óo]c1))))

  syl((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On), Ord((c0[√óo]c1)), (c0[√óo]c1)‚àà On)
  omcl(c0, c1)
  eloni((c0[√óo]c1))
  syl((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On), Ord((c0[√óo]c2)), (c0[√óo]c2)‚àà On)

  ordtri3((c0[√óo]c1), (c0[√óo]c2))
  adantr((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On), ‚àÖ ‚àà c0, (c1 = c2 ‚Üî ¬¨(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚à® c2 ‚àà c1)))

  syl2an(c1 ‚àà On, c2 ‚àà On, (c1 = c2 ‚Üî ¬¨(c1 ‚àà c2 ‚à® c2 ‚àà c1)), Ord(c1), Ord(c2))
  eloni(c1)
  eloni(c2)
  ordtri3(c1, c2)
  oveq2(c1, c2, c0, comu)
}

blocks.name: omword
blocks.content: Weak ordering property of ordinal multiplication. (Contributed by NM, 21-Dec-2004.)

blocks.name: odi
blocks.content: Distributive law for ordinal arithmetic (left-distributivity). Proposition 8.25 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 64. (Contributed by NM, 26-Dec-2004.)

blocks.name: omass
blocks.content: Multiplication of ordinal numbers is associative. Theorem 8.26 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 65. (Contributed by NM, 28-Dec-2004.)

blocks.name: omeu
blocks.content: The division algorithm for ordinal multiplication. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Feb-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm omeu(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wne(c0, emptycls)), weu(s0, wrex(s1, con0, wrex(s2, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(co(co(c0, comu, cv(s1)), coa, cv(s2)), c1))))))

blocks.content: Ordering law for ordinal exponentiation. Proposition 8.33 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 67. (Contributed by NM, 5-Jan-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-May-2015.)

  eleq2(hs1, suc(c2), c2)

  oveq2(hs1, suc(c2), c1, coe)
  eleq2d((c1[^o]c2), (c1[^o]hs0), ‚ãÉ(hs1 ‚àà hs0,(c1[^o]hs1)), ((Lim(hs0)‚àß c2 ‚àà hs0)‚àß c1 ‚àà(On \ 2o)))
  adantlr(Lim(hs0), c2 ‚àà hs0, c1 ‚àà(On \ 2o), (c1[^o]hs0)= ‚ãÉ(hs1 ‚àà hs0,(c1[^o]hs1)))

blocks.name: oeord
blocks.content: Ordering property of ordinal exponentiation. Corollary 8.34 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 68 and its converse. (Contributed by NM, 6-Jan-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm oeord(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, cdif(con0, c2o))), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(co(c2, coe, c0), co(c2, coe, c1))))
} = {
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, cdif(con0, c2o))), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(co(c2, coe, c0), co(c2, coe, c1)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, cdif(con0, c2o)), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(co(c2, coe, c0), co(c2, coe, c1))))
  oeordi(c1, c2, c0)
  3imtr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, cdif(con0, c2o))), wcel(co(c2, coe, c0), co(c2, coe, c1)), wcel(c0, c1), wn(wo(wceq(co(c2, coe, c0), co(c2, coe, c1)), wcel(co(c2, coe, c1), co(c2, coe, c0)))), wn(wo(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c0))))
  con3d(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, cdif(con0, c2o))), wo(wceq(co(c2, coe, c0), co(c2, coe, c1)), wcel(co(c2, coe, c1), co(c2, coe, c0))), wo(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c0)))
  orim12d(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, cdif(con0, c2o))), wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c0), wceq(co(c2, coe, c0), co(c2, coe, c1)), wcel(co(c2, coe, c1), co(c2, coe, c0)))
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, cdif(con0, c2o))), wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(co(c2, coe, c0), co(c2, coe, c1))))
  oveq2(c0, c1, c2, coe)
  3adant2(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, cdif(con0, c2o)), wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(co(c2, coe, c1), co(c2, coe, c0))))
  oeordi(c0, c2, c1)
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, cdif(con0, c2o))), wb(wcel(co(c2, coe, c0), co(c2, coe, c1)), wn(wo(wceq(co(c2, coe, c0), co(c2, coe, c1)), wcel(co(c2, coe, c1), co(c2, coe, c0))))), wcel(co(c2, coe, c0), con0), wcel(co(c2, coe, c1), con0))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, cdif(con0, c2o))), wcel(co(c2, coe, c0), con0), wcel(c2, con0), wcel(c0, con0))
  simp1(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, cdif(con0, c2o)))
  oecl(c2, c0)
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, cdif(con0, c2o))), wcel(co(c2, coe, c1), con0), wcel(c2, con0), wcel(c1, con0))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(c2, con0))
  eldifi(c2, con0, c2o)
  simp2(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, cdif(con0, c2o)))
  oecl(c2, c1)
  syl2an(wcel(co(c2, coe, c0), con0), wcel(co(c2, coe, c1), con0), wb(wcel(co(c2, coe, c0), co(c2, coe, c1)), wn(wo(wceq(co(c2, coe, c0), co(c2, coe, c1)), wcel(co(c2, coe, c1), co(c2, coe, c0))))), word(co(c2, coe, c0)), word(co(c2, coe, c1)))
  eloni(co(c2, coe, c0))
  eloni(co(c2, coe, c1))
  ordtri2(co(c2, coe, c0), co(c2, coe, c1))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, cdif(con0, c2o)), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wo(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c0)))))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wb(wcel(c0, c1), wn(wo(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c0)))), word(c0), word(c1))
  eloni(c0)
  eloni(c1)
  ordtri2(c0, c1)
}

thm oeord(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà(On \ 2o))‚Üí(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(c2[^o]c0)‚àà(c2[^o]c1)))
} = {
  impbid((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà(On \ 2o)), c0 ‚àà c1, (c2[^o]c0)‚àà(c2[^o]c1))
  3adant1(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, c2 ‚àà(On \ 2o), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2[^o]c0)‚àà(c2[^o]c1)))
  oeordi(c1, c2, c0)
  3imtr4d((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà(On \ 2o)), (c2[^o]c0)‚àà(c2[^o]c1), c0 ‚àà c1, ¬¨((c2[^o]c0)=(c2[^o]c1)‚à®(c2[^o]c1)‚àà(c2[^o]c0)), ¬¨(c0 = c1 ‚à® c1 ‚àà c0))
  con3d((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà(On \ 2o)), ((c2[^o]c0)=(c2[^o]c1)‚à®(c2[^o]c1)‚àà(c2[^o]c0)), (c0 = c1 ‚à® c1 ‚àà c0))
  orim12d((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà(On \ 2o)), c0 = c1, c1 ‚àà c0, (c2[^o]c0)=(c2[^o]c1), (c2[^o]c1)‚àà(c2[^o]c0))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà(On \ 2o)), (c0 = c1 ‚Üí(c2[^o]c0)=(c2[^o]c1)))
  oveq2(c0, c1, c2, coe)
  3adant2(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, c2 ‚àà(On \ 2o), (c1 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí(c2[^o]c1)‚àà(c2[^o]c0)))
  oeordi(c0, c2, c1)
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà(On \ 2o)), ((c2[^o]c0)‚àà(c2[^o]c1)‚Üî ¬¨((c2[^o]c0)=(c2[^o]c1)‚à®(c2[^o]c1)‚àà(c2[^o]c0))), (c2[^o]c0)‚àà On, (c2[^o]c1)‚àà On)
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà(On \ 2o)), (c2[^o]c0)‚àà On, c2 ‚àà On, c0 ‚àà On)
  simp1(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, c2 ‚àà(On \ 2o))
  oecl(c2, c0)
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà(On \ 2o)), (c2[^o]c1)‚àà On, c2 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On)
  3ad2ant3(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, c2 ‚àà(On \ 2o), c2 ‚àà On)
  eldifi(c2, con0, c2o)
  simp2(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, c2 ‚àà(On \ 2o))
  oecl(c2, c1)
  syl2an((c2[^o]c0)‚àà On, (c2[^o]c1)‚àà On, ((c2[^o]c0)‚àà(c2[^o]c1)‚Üî ¬¨((c2[^o]c0)=(c2[^o]c1)‚à®(c2[^o]c1)‚àà(c2[^o]c0))), Ord((c2[^o]c0)), Ord((c2[^o]c1)))
  eloni((c2[^o]c0))
  eloni((c2[^o]c1))
  ordtri2((c2[^o]c0), (c2[^o]c1))
  3adant3(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, c2 ‚àà(On \ 2o), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî ¬¨(c0 = c1 ‚à® c1 ‚àà c0)))
  syl2an(c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî ¬¨(c0 = c1 ‚à® c1 ‚àà c0)), Ord(c0), Ord(c1))
  eloni(c0)
  eloni(c1)
  ordtri2(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: oecan
blocks.content: Left cancellation law for ordinal exponentiation. (Contributed by NM, 6-Jan-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm oecan(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wb(wceq(co(c0, coe, c1), co(c0, coe, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))
} = {
  impbid1(w3a(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wceq(co(c0, coe, c1), co(c0, coe, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
  3imtr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wceq(co(c0, coe, c1), co(c0, coe, c2)), wceq(c1, c2), wn(wo(wcel(co(c0, coe, c1), co(c0, coe, c2)), wcel(co(c0, coe, c2), co(c0, coe, c1)))), wn(wo(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c1))))
  con3d(w3a(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wo(wcel(co(c0, coe, c1), co(c0, coe, c2)), wcel(co(c0, coe, c2), co(c0, coe, c1))), wo(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c1)))
  orim12d(w3a(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(co(c0, coe, c1), co(c0, coe, c2)), wcel(co(c0, coe, c2), co(c0, coe, c1)))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wi(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c0, coe, c1), co(c0, coe, c2))))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(c2, con0), wi(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c0, coe, c1), co(c0, coe, c2))))
  oeordi(c2, c0, c1)
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wi(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(co(c0, coe, c2), co(c0, coe, c1))))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(c1, con0), wi(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(co(c0, coe, c2), co(c0, coe, c1))))
  oeordi(c1, c0, c2)
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wb(wceq(co(c0, coe, c1), co(c0, coe, c2)), wn(wo(wcel(co(c0, coe, c1), co(c0, coe, c2)), wcel(co(c0, coe, c2), co(c0, coe, c1))))), wcel(co(c0, coe, c1), con0), wcel(co(c0, coe, c2), con0))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wcel(co(c0, coe, c1), con0), wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0))
  oecl(c0, c1)
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0)), wcel(co(c0, coe, c2), con0), wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c2, con0))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wcel(c0, con0))
  eldifi(c0, con0, c2o)
  simp3(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0))
  oecl(c0, c2)
  syl2an(wcel(co(c0, coe, c1), con0), wcel(co(c0, coe, c2), con0), wb(wceq(co(c0, coe, c1), co(c0, coe, c2)), wn(wo(wcel(co(c0, coe, c1), co(c0, coe, c2)), wcel(co(c0, coe, c2), co(c0, coe, c1))))), word(co(c0, coe, c1)), word(co(c0, coe, c2)))
  eloni(co(c0, coe, c1))
  eloni(co(c0, coe, c2))

  3adant1(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wb(wceq(c1, c2), wn(wo(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c1)))))
  syl2an(wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, con0), wb(wceq(c1, c2), wn(wo(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c1)))), word(c1), word(c2))

  eloni(c2)

thm oecan(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  oeordi(c1, c0, c2)
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà(On \ 2o)‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On), ((c0[^o]c1)=(c0[^o]c2)‚Üî ¬¨((c0[^o]c1)‚àà(c0[^o]c2)‚à®(c0[^o]c2)‚àà(c0[^o]c1))), (c0[^o]c1)‚àà On, (c0[^o]c2)‚àà On)
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà(On \ 2o)‚àß c1 ‚àà On ‚àß c2 ‚àà On), (c0[^o]c1)‚àà On, c0 ‚àà On, c1 ‚àà On)

  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà(On \ 2o), c1 ‚àà On, c2 ‚àà On, c0 ‚àà On)

blocks.name: oeworde
blocks.content: Ordinal exponentiation compared to its exponent. Proposition 8.37 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 68. (Contributed by NM, 7-Jan-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-May-2015.)

thm oeworde(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(c1, con0)), wss(c1, co(c0, coe, c1)))
} = {
  impcom(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(c1, con0), wss(c1, co(c0, coe, c1)))
  tfinds3(hs0, hs1, c1, wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wss(c1, co(c0, coe, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), co(c0, coe, cv(hs0))), wss(emptycls, co(c0, coe, emptycls)), wss(cv(hs1), co(c0, coe, cv(hs1))), wss(csuc(cv(hs1)), co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1)))))
  sseq12d(cv(hs0), co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), emptycls, co(c0, coe, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))

  id(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))

  sseq12d(cv(hs0), co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), csuc(cv(hs1)), co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1)), c0, coe)
  sseq12d(cv(hs0), co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), c1, co(c0, coe, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0, coe)
  a1i(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wss(emptycls, co(c0, coe, emptycls)))
  0ss(co(c0, coe, emptycls))
  expcom(wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wi(wss(cv(hs1), co(c0, coe, cv(hs1))), wss(csuc(cv(hs1)), co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1))))))
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs1), con0)), wss(cv(hs1), co(c0, coe, cv(hs1))), wss(csuc(cv(hs1)), co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1)))), wss(csuc(cv(hs1)), csuc(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)))))
  syl2an2(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wb(wss(cv(hs1), co(c0, coe, cv(hs1))), wss(csuc(cv(hs1)), csuc(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1))))), word(cv(hs1)), word(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1))))
  eloni(cv(hs1))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs1), con0)), word(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1))), wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), con0))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), con0), wcel(c0, con0))
  oecl(c0, cv(hs1))
  eloni(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)))
  ordsucsssuc(cv(hs1), co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)))
  syl5com(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs1), con0)), wss(csuc(cv(hs1)), csuc(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)))), wss(csuc(cv(hs1)), co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1)))), wss(csuc(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1))), co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1)))))
  sylc(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs1), con0)), wss(csuc(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1))), co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1)))), word(co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1)))), wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1)))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs1), con0)), word(co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1)))), wcel(co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1))), con0))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wcel(co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1))), con0), wcel(c0, con0), wcel(csuc(cv(hs1)), con0))
  oecl(c0, csuc(cv(hs1)))
  eloni(co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1))))
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1)))), wcel(csuc(cv(hs1)), con0), wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)))
  suceloni(cv(hs1))
  id(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)))
  mpi(wa(wcel(csuc(cv(hs1)), con0), wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o))), wcel(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)), co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs1), csuc(cv(hs1))))
  sucid(cv(hs1))
  vex(hs1)
  oeordi(csuc(cv(hs1)), c0, cv(hs1))
  ordsucss(co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1))), co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)))
  sstr2(csuc(cv(hs1)), csuc(co(c0, coe, cv(hs1))), co(c0, coe, csuc(cv(hs1))))
  syl5(wlim(cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wi(wral(hs1, cv(hs0), wss(cv(hs1), co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)))), wss(cv(hs0), co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(emptycls, c0)))
  jca(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(c0, con0), wcel(emptycls, c0))
  eldifi(c0, con0, c2o)
  dif20el(c0)
  ex(wlim(cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(emptycls, c0)), wi(wral(hs1, cv(hs0), wss(cv(hs1), co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)))), wss(cv(hs0), co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)))))
  syl5ibr(wa(wlim(cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(emptycls, c0))), wral(hs1, cv(hs0), wss(cv(hs1), co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)))), wss(cv(hs0), co(c0, coe, cv(hs0))), wss(ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)))))
  ss2iun(hs1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)))
  sseq12d(cv(hs0), co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), co(c0, coe, cv(hs1))), wa(wlim(cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(emptycls, c0))))
  adantr(wlim(cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(emptycls, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  syl6eq(cv(hs0), ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cuni(cv(hs0)), wlim(cv(hs0)))
  limuni(cv(hs0))
  uniiun(hs1, cv(hs0))
  an12s(wlim(cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, con0), wcel(emptycls, c0), wceq(co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)))))
  anasss(wcel(c0, con0), wlim(cv(hs0)), wcel(emptycls, c0), wceq(co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)))))
  mpanlr1(wcel(c0, con0), wlim(cv(hs0)), wcel(emptycls, c0), wceq(co(c0, coe, cv(hs0)), ciun(hs1, cv(hs0), co(c0, coe, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  oelim(hs1, c0, cv(hs0), universe)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)))
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c1, co(c0, coe, c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(wss(cv(hs1), co(c0, coe, cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)))
  diff.hs1.w(wss(cv(hs0), co(c0, coe, cv(hs0))))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(On \ 2o)‚àß c1 ‚àà On)‚Üí c1 ‚äÜ(c0[^o]c1))
} = {
  impcom(c0 ‚àà(On \ 2o), c1 ‚àà On, c1 ‚äÜ(c0[^o]c1))

  id(hs0 = suc(hs1))

  sseq12d(hs0, (c0[^o]hs0), c1, (c0[^o]c1), hs0 = c1)
  id(hs0 = c1)
  oveq2(hs0, c1, c0, coe)
  a1i(c0 ‚àà(On \ 2o), ‚àÖ ‚äÜ(c0[^o]‚àÖ))
  0ss((c0[^o]‚àÖ))
  expcom(hs1 ‚àà On, c0 ‚àà(On \ 2o), (hs1 ‚äÜ(c0[^o]hs1)‚Üí suc(hs1)‚äÜ(c0[^o]suc(hs1))))
  sylbid((c0 ‚àà(On \ 2o)‚àß hs1 ‚àà On), hs1 ‚äÜ(c0[^o]hs1), suc(hs1)‚äÜ(c0[^o]suc(hs1)), suc(hs1)‚äÜ suc((c0[^o]hs1)))
  syl2an2(c0 ‚àà(On \ 2o), hs1 ‚àà On, (hs1 ‚äÜ(c0[^o]hs1)‚Üî suc(hs1)‚äÜ suc((c0[^o]hs1))), Ord(hs1), Ord((c0[^o]hs1)))
  eloni(hs1)

  sylan(c0 ‚àà(On \ 2o), hs1 ‚àà On, (c0[^o]hs1)‚àà On, c0 ‚àà On)
  oecl(c0, hs1)
  eloni((c0[^o]hs1))
  ordsucsssuc(hs1, (c0[^o]hs1))
  syl5com((c0 ‚àà(On \ 2o)‚àß hs1 ‚àà On), suc(hs1)‚äÜ suc((c0[^o]hs1)), suc(hs1)‚äÜ(c0[^o]suc(hs1)), suc((c0[^o]hs1))‚äÜ(c0[^o]suc(hs1)))
  sylc((c0 ‚àà(On \ 2o)‚àß hs1 ‚àà On), suc((c0[^o]hs1))‚äÜ(c0[^o]suc(hs1)), Ord((c0[^o]suc(hs1))), (c0[^o]hs1)‚àà(c0[^o]suc(hs1)))
  syl((c0 ‚àà(On \ 2o)‚àß hs1 ‚àà On), Ord((c0[^o]suc(hs1))), (c0[^o]suc(hs1))‚àà On)
  syl2an(c0 ‚àà(On \ 2o), hs1 ‚àà On, (c0[^o]suc(hs1))‚àà On, c0 ‚àà On, suc(hs1)‚àà On)
  oecl(c0, suc(hs1))
  eloni((c0[^o]suc(hs1)))
  syl2anr(c0 ‚àà(On \ 2o), hs1 ‚àà On, (c0[^o]hs1)‚àà(c0[^o]suc(hs1)), suc(hs1)‚àà On, c0 ‚àà(On \ 2o))
  suceloni(hs1)
  id(c0 ‚àà(On \ 2o))
  mpi((suc(hs1)‚àà On ‚àß c0 ‚àà(On \ 2o)), (c0[^o]hs1)‚àà(c0[^o]suc(hs1)), hs1 ‚àà suc(hs1))
  sucid(hs1)

  adantr(Lim(hs0), (c0 ‚àà On ‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àà c0), hs0 = ‚ãÉ(hs1 ‚àà hs0, hs1))
  syl6eq(hs0, ‚ãÉ(hs1 ‚àà hs0, hs1), ‚ãÉ hs0, Lim(hs0))
  limuni(hs0)

blocks.name: oeordsuc
blocks.content: Ordering property of ordinal exponentiation with a successor exponent. Corollary 8.36 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 68. (Contributed by NM, 7-Jan-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm oeordsuc(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wi(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(co(c2, coe, csuc(c1)), co(c0, coe, csuc(c1)))))
} = {
  mpdd(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(co(c2, coe, csuc(c1)), co(c0, coe, csuc(c1))), wcel(c2, con0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wi(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c2, con0)))
  ex(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c2, con0))
  onelon(c0, c2)
  imp(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wi(wcel(c2, c0), wi(wcel(c2, con0), wcel(co(c2, coe, csuc(c1)), co(c0, coe, csuc(c1))))))
  com4l(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c2, con0), wcel(co(c2, coe, csuc(c1)), co(c0, coe, csuc(c1))))
  exp31(wcel(c2, con0), wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wi(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(co(c2, coe, csuc(c1)), co(c0, coe, csuc(c1)))))
  syld(wa(wa(wcel(c2, con0), wcel(c0, con0)), wcel(c1, con0)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(co(c2, coe, csuc(c1)), co(c0, coe, csuc(c1))), wa(wss(co(c2, coe, csuc(c1)), co(co(c0, coe, c1), comu, c2)), wcel(co(co(c0, coe, c1), comu, c2), co(c0, coe, csuc(c1)))))
  3expa(wcel(c2, con0), wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0), wi(wcel(c2, c0), wa(wss(co(c2, coe, csuc(c1)), co(co(c0, coe, c1), comu, c2)), wcel(co(co(c0, coe, c1), comu, c2), co(c0, coe, csuc(c1))))))
  jcad(w3a(wcel(c2, con0), wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wcel(c2, c0), wss(co(c2, coe, csuc(c1)), co(co(c0, coe, c1), comu, c2)), wcel(co(co(c0, coe, c1), comu, c2), co(c0, coe, csuc(c1))))
  sylibrd(w3a(wcel(c2, con0), wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wcel(c2, c0), wss(co(c2, coe, csuc(c1)), co(co(c0, coe, c1), comu, c2)), wss(co(co(c2, coe, c1), comu, c2), co(co(c0, coe, c1), comu, c2)))
  syld(w3a(wcel(c2, con0), wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0)), wcel(c2, c0), wss(co(co(c2, coe, c1), comu, c2), co(co(c0, coe, c1), comu, c2)), wss(co(c2, coe, c1), co(c0, coe, c1)))

blocks.name: oelim2
blocks.content: Ordinal exponentiation with a limit exponent. Part of Exercise 4.36 of [Mendelson] p. 250. (Contributed by NM, 6-Jan-2005.)

thm oeoalem(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wceq(co(c1, coe, co(c2, coa, c0)), co(co(c1, coe, c2), comu, co(c1, coe, c0))))
  -| wcel(c1, con0)
  -| wcel(emptycls, c1)
  -| wcel(c2, con0)
} = {
  tfinds(hs0, hs1, c0, wceq(co(c1, coe, co(c2, coa, c0)), co(co(c1, coe, c2), comu, co(c1, coe, c0))), wceq(co(c1, coe, co(c2, coa, cv(hs0))), co(co(c1, coe, c2), comu, co(c1, coe, cv(hs0)))), wceq(co(c1, coe, co(c2, coa, emptycls)), co(co(c1, coe, c2), comu, co(c1, coe, emptycls))), wceq(co(c1, coe, co(c2, coa, cv(hs1))), co(co(c1, coe, c2), comu, co(c1, coe, cv(hs1)))), wceq(co(c1, coe, co(c2, coa, csuc(cv(hs1)))), co(co(c1, coe, c2), comu, co(c1, coe, csuc(cv(hs1))))))

  oveq2d(c1, coe, co(c2, coa, cv(hs0)), co(c2, coa, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, c2, coa)
  oveq2d(co(c1, coe, c2), comu, co(c1, coe, cv(hs0)), co(c1, coe, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), emptycls, c1, coe)

  oveq2d(c1, coe, co(c2, coa, cv(hs0)), co(c2, coa, csuc(cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1))))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1)), c2, coa)

  oveq2(cv(hs0), csuc(cv(hs1)), c1, coe)
  eqeq12d(co(c1, coe, co(c2, coa, cv(hs0))), co(co(c1, coe, c2), comu, co(c1, coe, cv(hs0))), co(c1, coe, co(c2, coa, c0)), co(co(c1, coe, c2), comu, co(c1, coe, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2d(c1, coe, co(c2, coa, cv(hs0)), co(c2, coa, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c0, c2, coa)

blocks.name: oeoa
blocks.content: Sum of exponents law for ordinal exponentiation. Theorem 8R of [Enderton] p. 238. Also Proposition 8.41 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 69. (Contributed by Eric Schmidt, 26-May-2009.)

  oveq2(hs0, emptycls, c0, comu)
  eqeq12d(((c2[^o]c0)[^o]hs0), (c2[^o](c0[√óo]hs0)), ((c2[^o]c0)[^o]hs1), (c2[^o](c0[√óo]hs1)), hs0 = hs1)

blocks.name: oeoe
blocks.content: Product of exponents law for ordinal exponentiation. Theorem 8S of [Enderton] p. 238. Also Proposition 8.42 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 70. (Contributed by Eric Schmidt, 26-May-2009.)

blocks.name: oeeui
blocks.content: The division algorithm for ordinal exponentiation. (This version of ~ oeeu gives an explicit expression for the unique solution of the equation, in terms of the solution ` P ` to ~ omeu .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm oeeui(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(c1, cdif(con0, c1o))), wb(wa(w3a(wcel(c2, con0), wcel(c3, cdif(c0, c1o)), wcel(c4, co(c0, coe, c2))), wceq(co(co(co(c0, coe, c2), comu, c3), coa, c4), c1)), w3a(wceq(c2, c5), wceq(c3, c6), wceq(c4, c7))))
  -| wceq(c5, cuni(cint(crab(s0, con0, wcel(c1, co(c0, coe, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c8, cio(s1, wrex(s2, con0, wrex(s3, co(c0, coe, c5), wa(wceq(cv(s1), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wceq(co(co(co(c0, coe, c5), comu, cv(s2)), coa, cv(s3)), c1))))))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c1st, c8))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(c2nd, c8))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(c1, cdif(con0, c1o))), wb(wa(w3a(wcel(c2, con0), wcel(c3, cdif(c0, c1o)), wcel(c4, co(c0, coe, c2))), wceq(co(co(co(c0, coe, c2), comu, c3), coa, c4), c1)), w3a(wceq(c2, c5), wceq(c3, c6), wceq(c4, c7)))), diffss(s0, s1))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(c1, cdif(con0, c1o))), wb(wa(w3a(wcel(c2, con0), wcel(c3, cdif(c0, c1o)), wcel(c4, co(c0, coe, c2))), wceq(co(co(co(c0, coe, c2), comu, c3), coa, c4), c1)), w3a(wceq(c2, c5), wceq(c3, c6), wceq(c4, c7)))), diffss(s0, s2))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(con0, c2o)), wcel(c1, cdif(con0, c1o))), wb(wa(w3a(wcel(c2, con0), wcel(c3, cdif(c0, c1o)), wcel(c4, co(c0, coe, c2))), wceq(co(co(co(c0, coe, c2), comu, c3), coa, c4), c1)), w3a(wceq(c2, c5), wceq(c3, c6), wceq(c4, c7)))), diffss(s0, s3))
